description:
Learn Everything You Need to Know About VigLink And How To Make Money From Your Social Networks!

  • VigLink: Introduction To The Platform
  • How You Can Monetize Your Social Networks
  • Account Creation: Setup Your First Campaign
  • Link Creation: Find Your Merchants And Create Links
  • Make Money From Talking About The Products You Love
  • Turn Links Into Steady Streams of Income

Join Over 1,300 Students, and Learn a Variety of Ways You Can Monetize Your Social Networks.

If you want to make money online, or if you're planning on starting your own Online Teaching career, then here's a perfect course for you to learn about VigLink, and how you can use VigLink to make extra money on the side simply by talking about the products you use and love using, anything from Camping Gear to Clothes.

This course is regularly updated and along with video tutorials it also contains exercises, manuals and resources to help you succeed. Anyone looking to get into affiliate marketing should sign up todayâ€”no prior experience necessary.

Contents and Overview

The largest network of its kind, VigLink monetizes content that drives commerce for over 300,000 sites and works with more than 35,000 merchants to drive sales. Each month, VigLink processes more than 10 billion pageviews and over five hundred million clicks. Founded in 2009 and based in San Francisco, VigLink is backed by top investors including Google Ventures, First Round Capital, Emergence Capital, and RRE.

You will learn about VigLink:

  • Who is VigLink for?
  • The Features
  • Analytics & Insights
  • How you will make money
  • How VigLink makes money
  • How you will get paid
  • How traffic is generated
  • Referral program
  • How to create an account
  • How to install VigLink
  • How to use the Merchant Explorer
    • Find the best Commission Rates
  • How to generate your own VigLink
  • How (and where) to post your VigLink
  • How to measure your success
title: VigLink: How I Make Hundreds Every Day With Social Media
